Package com.example.nerdherd.RecycleViewAdapters

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AvatarListAdapter.onClickListener
    Listens for click events within the view
    ExperimentListAdapter.onClickListener
    Listens for click events within the view
    MyExperimentListAdapter.onClickListener
    Listens for click events within the view
    ProfileListAdapter.onClickListener
    Listens for click events within the view
    QuestionsListAdapter.onClickListener
    Listens for click events within the view
    TrialsListAdapter.onClickListener
    Listens for click events within the view
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdapterController
    Controller class for Adapter model class The controller class for Adapter to get notified of the user's behaviour and update the model class as needed
    AvatarListAdapter
    The class allows it to be visible for the user to pick and choose The user gets to pick an image for their register The class contains some motivation from a tutorial found here
    ExperimentListAdapter
    Shows the experiment in the main UI of the app
    MyExperimentListAdapter
    The current logged in user's experiment information is stored for the app to access
    ProfileListAdapter  
    QuestionsListAdapter
    Adapter for showing Questions in a formatted list
    ReplyListAdapter
    Adapter for displaying replies in a formatted list
    TrialsListAdapter
    Adapter class for Trial method class This makes the trial visible on the app for the user/owner to choose/pick
